0.text: Amitha: Wow! Did you do it all by yourself?
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Amitha: Wow! Did you do it all by yourself?</prosody></speak>

1.text: Milan: All by myself? How could I? Ameena and Romesh helped me with the invitations for the invitees and the judges. Our art teacher himself designed the invitation for the Chief Guest.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Milan: All by myself? How could I? Ameena and Romesh helped me with the invitations for the invitees and the judges. Our art teacher himself designed the invitation for the Chief Guest.</prosody></speak>

2.text: Saranga: Rajeshwari, how about selecting costumes for the drama, the sound system and the decorations?
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Saranga: Rajeshwari, how about selecting costumes for the drama, the sound system and the decorations?</prosody></speak>

3.text: Rajeshwari: Jude will take care of the sounds. Ruvin and Meena
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Rajeshwari: Jude will take care of the sounds. Ruvin and Meena</prosody></speak>

4.text: promised to do the decorations by themselves. But, selecting costumes for the drama is a problem. I can't manage it by myself. I need someone to help me.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>promised to do the decorations by themselves. But, selecting costumes for the drama is a problem. I can't manage it by myself. I need someone to help me.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Amitha: I can ask my mother to help us with that.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Amitha: I can ask my mother to help us with that.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Milan: How about the language activities and games?
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Milan: How about the language activities and games?</prosody></speak>

9.text: Saranga: Our English teacher said that she herself would prepare them. Well, we seem to be doing fine so far. I'm sure we can make the English camp a success and be proud of ourselves.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Saranga: Our English teacher said that she herself would prepare them. Well, we seem to be doing fine so far. I'm sure we can make the English camp a success and be proud of ourselves.</prosody></speak>

11.text: Read and answer the given questions.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read and answer the given questions.</prosody></speak>

12.text: 1. Who were the members of the organizing committee? 2. Where did the organizing committee meet? 3. Did Milan prepare the invitation cards by himself? 4. Who designed the invitation for the Chief Guest? 5. What were the responsibilities of the following students? List them. a. Jude b. Ruvin and Meena 6. How did they solve the problem of selecting the costumes for the drama?
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Who were the members of the organizing committee? 2. Where did the organizing committee meet? 3. Did Milan prepare the invitation cards by himself? 4. Who designed the invitation for the Chief Guest? 5. What were the responsibilities of the following students? List them. a. Jude b. Ruvin and Meena 6.
